title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap Ollama models into any chain, agent, or retrieval pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs entirely in browser with no external calls.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports generate, chat, pull, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline code copilot with autocomplete and explain.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app (Rust+React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-driven recipes: PDF chatbot, voice assistant, function-calling, fine-tuning, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks adding Open-WebUI, Postgres memory, and Nginx reverse proxy.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search and generation.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into channels with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node enabling no-code workflows that generate text, summarize, or classify data via Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that wraps Ollama for rapid prototyping of LLM apps with chat UI and parameters sidebar.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spins up Ollama containers to run model-based tests or generate docs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing strongly-typed Ollama endpoints via reqwest; includes chat, generate, and embeddings.
